channel.title: [317] Help with object
channel.description:
I want to make a new object
like the thieving way
player clicks on it and reseved 1k coins for example.
how do i add a new one :]?
thanks.

item.title: [317] Help with object
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

Code:
if (objectID == ID of the object you want

try searching for the "if (objectID " you’ll find an example.
I won’t spoon feed you, sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Help with object
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

Look, if you manage to get as far as running a server you probably read a few tutorials. Go dig your face in the server tutorials section or the search bar. Let me show you the use of common sense so I can open up your eyes to a whole new world.
If you look around the server I gurantee you wil find an object that either gives you experience or an item if you use the same code as that object for the new object and customize it your likes and wants your question will be answered. I hope I taught you well my son.

Read full topic
